sections.heading: assessor; residence requirements
sections.text: A county assessor need not be a resident of the county when he or she files for election as county assessor, but a county assessor shall reside in a county for which he or she holds office.SourceLaws 1969, c. 623, § 6, p. 2522;R.S.1943, (1986), § 77-426;Laws 1990, LB

23-3204.County assessor; residence requirements.

A county assessor need not be a resident of the county when he or she files for election as county assessor, but a county assessor shall reside in a county for which he or she holds office.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 623, § 6, p. 2522;R.S.1943, (1986), § 77-426;Laws 1990, LB 821, § 19;Laws 1996, LB 1085, § 37.
